title: Ticket #242: Clean up /unsup/condor/etc/hosts
description:
/unsup/condor/etc/hosts is a mess, with over 2,000 files, of which at least 500 are completely unused. This needs to be cleaned out. Furthermore, a bunch of files either aren't in CVS, or are uncommitted.

/unsup/condor/etc/hosts/local_config_report writes a report to standard output about the state of these files. It can detect many problems (and hopefully will be extended to catch more.)

Remember that any changes should be committed to CVS!
remarks:
2009-Mar-20 17:17:45 by adesmet:
I purged about 750 files. This should occasionally be revisited, but it's good enough for now.
